page.description: Adds a number of years to a date.
page.syntax: Ending_Date as D = ADDYEARS(D date,N years)

argument.name: date
argument.description: The date to which you will add business days.

argument.name: years
argument.description: The number of years to add.

page.discussion: ADDYEARS() returns an Ending_Date equal to Date plus the specified Number_Of_Year s. The ADDYEARS() function works by adding the specified Number_Of_Year s to the Starting_Date and then checking if the resulting date is valid. If the resulting date is not valid (e.g., 2-29-92 plus 1 year is 2-29-93), Alpha Anywhere returns the next valid day (e.g., 3-1-93).
